Text: Another Three Million, Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars (US$3,500,000) has been secured from UNESCO-KOICA to transform The Gambia Technical Training Institute (GTTI) into a university.
Cause: UNESCO-KOICA to transform The Gambia Technical Training Institute (GTTI) into a university.
Effect: Another Three Million, Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars (US$3,500,000) has been secured
Sentence: <e2>Another Three Million, Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars (US$3,500,000) has been secured</e2> from <e1>UNESCO-KOICA to transform The Gambia Technical Training Institute (GTTI) into a university.</e1>
